backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a recovery companion app with user profiles, check-ins, medications, dose logs, meetings, emergency contacts, commitments plans, and NFL Combine tracking with public/private entries and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: verifying the Published feed displays all public combine entries (REQ-1) and adding sorting/leaderboard capability to the Published feed (REQ-3).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend source files covering the NFL Combine tracker app with guest/authenticated modes, recovery program features, medication tracking, check-ins, and combine entry management with localStorage and React Query hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based color system defining design tokens for light and dark modes with athletic-themed blue/purple primary colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for NFL Combine Tracker with PWA manifest, iOS support, meta tags, and theme color configuration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode for NFL Combine Tracker.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API calls with cache fallback, plus cache versioning and cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with TanStack Router setup defining routes for landing, dashboard, new entry, history, entry detail, share card, public entry, and published feed with authentication-aware layout and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with authentication state management and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup requiring name input before accessing the app, with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/checkins/CheckIn: Empty file placeholder for check-in editor component.
Empty file placeholder for check-in trends component.
frontend/src/components/combine/Benchmar: Displays a badge and description comparing a drill value to benchmark levels (elite, above-average, average, below-average) with reference values shown.
frontend/src/components/combine/CombineE: Form component for entering NFL combine data including athlete info, measurements, and drill results with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/combine/CombineT: SVG-based line chart component that visualizes combine metric trends over time with improvement indicators.
Panel displaying trend charts for 40-yard dash, vertical jump, and bench press metrics from multiple combine entries.
Main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and authentication status display; includes guest mode badge.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCombine.ts: Custom hooks for CRUD operations on combine entries, supporting both authenticated users (via actor) and guest mode (via local storage).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, muted, destructive, and sidebar variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/combine/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page displaying combine entry statistics, quick action cards for new entry/history/published, latest entry summary, and trends panel.
frontend/src/pages/combine/EntryDetail.t: Detail view for a single combine entry showing all drill results, measurements, benchmark comparisons, and actions for toggling public visibility, sharing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/combine/History.tsx: Displays a paginated list of the authenticated user's combine entries with navigation to individual entry details and a back button to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/combine/NewEntry.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new combine entry, validates and parses the input data, then saves it via mutation and navigates to the entry detail page.
frontend/src/pages/combine/PublicEntry.t: Displays a public combine entry with performance results and benchmark comparisons, accessible via a public URL without authentication.
frontend/src/pages/combine/Published.tsx: Shows a leaderboard of all public combine entries with sortable metrics (40-yard dash, vertical jump, etc.) and navigation to individual public entries.
frontend/src/pages/combine/ShareCard.tsx: Generates a shareable card view of a combine entry with copy-to-clipboard functionality for public entries and screenshot instructions for private/guest entries.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page showcasing NFL Combine Tracker features with login/guest options, hero section, and feature cards for tracking athletic performance.
frontend/src/utils/combineBenchmarks.ts: Defines benchmark thresholds (elite, good, average) for each combine drill and provides a comparison function to categorize performance levels.
frontend/src/utils/combineGuestStorage.t: Manages localStorage-based CRUD operations for guest (unauthenticated) combine entries with auto-incrementing IDs and timestamp tracking.
frontend/src/utils/combineSorting.ts: Defines sorting logic for combine entries with multiple metrics (speed drills ascending, strength/jump descending) and exports sort options for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/combineValidation.ts: Provides form validation for combine data entry with field-specific min/max ranges and helper functions to parse optional numeric inputs.
frontend/src/utils/exporters.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for future export functionality.
frontend/src/utils/reminders.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for future reminder functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/src/utils/userScopedStorage.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for user-specific storage functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme tokens for sidebar/charts, custom animations, and typography/container plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking NFL Combine Tracker features, including existing leaderboard sorting and pending action items to verify public feed displays all users' entries.
